channel.title: emergency Management on Mianshi Handbook

item.title: Call After Hours
item.description: Q: Received a call after hours, UV light bulb broke. Everyone went for the day and contract lab is closed. What do you do? This question checks if I know of the process. [background]: why did I receive the call? I will get hold of the manager-on-call. Contract lab is closed, could not take sample(s) and do analysis. use alternative process?
